## USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

### Running Tests
```bash
# Run all tests
pytest

# Run with verbose output
pytest -v

# Run specific test file
pytest VariableExtender/generic_tree/test_generic_tree_complete.py -v

# Run with coverage
pytest --cov=Utilities --cov=VariableExtender --cov-report=html

# Run by marker
pytest -m "unit"          # Unit tests only
pytest -m "integration"   # Integration tests only
pytest -m "not slow"      # Skip slow tests
```

### Running GUI Applications
```bash
# Main GUI menu
python run_gui.py

# Utilities category GUI
python Utilities/run_gui.py

# VariableExtender category GUI
python VariableExtender/run_gui.py

# Module-specific GUIs
python VariableExtender/generic_tree/run_gui.py
python VariableExtender/MenuMaker/run_gui.py
python VariableExtender/Multidimention_table/run_gui.py
```

### Running Console Menus
```bash
# Main menu
python run.py

# Category menus
python Utilities/run.py
python VariableExtender/run.py
```

## DEVELOPMENT WORKFLOW

### Setting Up Development Environment
```bash
# Create virtual environment
python -m venv venv

# Activate virtual environment (Windows)
venv\Scripts\activate

# Install development dependencies
pip install -e ".[dev,test]"
```

### Running Code Quality Checks
```bash
# Format code
black Utilities VariableExtender

# Check style
flake8 Utilities VariableExtender

# Type checking
mypy Utilities VariableExtender

# Run tests with coverage
pytest --cov=. --cov-report=html
```
